author: Sanearoudy
title: Not really worth it
review: Taking apart and putting back together the plastic cases that the coins go in is very fiddly. The screws are very difficult to get in straight and the flat ends need to be firmly pressed on a non-slippery surface to stop them from spinning. It took me over an hour to take apart the 6 cases, clean them, move the coins, and put them back together. The inside still has plenty of dust trapped in it. If you want to display all 5 coins together in one case it does look nice but the time, cost, and effort involved could be much better spent building actual Lego sets!
